name: TPK Compass - 0.5.3
description:
ModID: 2723129877
Testlive ID: 2876280494

A much needed simple compass indicator.  Clan member tracking.  Still alpha.
Supports Age of Sorcery.

Options panel is planned for next feature.
Has not been tested in Client-hosted environment.


pak file available at: https://github.com/TPKill/TPK_Compass/releases
changeNote:
Optimized clan tracking.  It was iterating through all thralls as well as players, wasting RAM and CPU.  Doesn't do that anymore.
Fixed bug where clan pips weren't tracking inside dungeons.
Added distant clan-member tracking.  Name popups for distant pips are missing to save bandwidth.  I'm considering adding them as a server-side option.
Beginning framework for an options panel.
author: Mahalito
